name: PéoLéo
description: PéoLéo is the first cross-communication consultancy, an agency that employs an original methodology - the result of 5 years of research. This methodology enables us to accompany the most ambitious brands along the journey from strategy to operational devices offline and online. PéoLéo is an independent and integrated agency. It undertakes projects in many fields close to its core business. It employs 85 people with more than 30 trades in three sites.
